trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3GUIDE3_00519_CULINARIAN00519_000_000<tab>The longer we're dug in here, the harder my job gets. Piping hot stew might do the trick for a time, but a body needs variety, and my resources are limited.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3GUIDE3_00519_CULINARIAN00519_000_010<tab>I heard about that mess with the proto-aetheryte. Everyone did. Lot of sullen faces these days. I do what I can to raise their spirits, but as soon as they head back out the door, they're back to thinking about the expedition's future...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3GUIDE3_00519_CULINARIAN00519_000_020<tab>Maybe it's just wishful thinking, but lately everyone seems to be in higher spirits. Don't know if someone figured out how to deal with our recent setbacks─or maybe my latest culinary experiments have been making a difference?
